snippet.title: Title: Emergence of resonances in neural systems: the interplay between threshold adaptation and short-term synaptic plasticity
snippet.description:
Title: Emergence of resonances in neural systems: the interplay between threshold adaptation and short-term synaptic plasticity
Authors: Jorge F. Mejias, Joaquin J. Torres
Comments: 24 pages, 8 figures, submitted to Neural Computation
Subjects: Neurons and Cognition (q-bio.NC)
